function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of unstructured data from terminal sensors to the cloud platform in real-time","Impact":"Increased risk of data transmission leading to potential exposure to contagious diseases in the built environment","Mitigation":"Implement strict data encryption and security protocols to safeguard transmitted data","Technologies":"Encryption technologies, secure communication protocols","People":"Staff working with terminal sensors and cloud platform","Owner":"Data security and technology teams"},{"Description":"Transmitting on-site high-definition images and videos to remote command center in real-time","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to contagious diseases for staff in remote command center","Mitigation":"Implement remote monitoring technologies to limit physical presence, use personal protective equipment (PPE) when necessary","Technologies":"Remote monitoring systems, personal protective equipment (PPE)","People":"Staff in remote command center","Owner":"Management and technology teams"}]}
